properties.description: please refer to the NSIP Entity Message Topic Requirements  documentation

source:
%%sql

CREATE OR REPLACE TEMPORARY VIEW nsip_relevant_reps_new 

    AS

SELECT
	--casework_nsip_project_info_internal_dim
	T1.casework_nsip_project_info_internal_dim.ProjectName	AS	ProjectName,
	'NULL'	AS	Decision,
	T1.casework_nsip_project_info_internal_dim.ProjectStatus 	AS	PublishStatus,
	T1.casework_nsip_project_info_internal_dim.PublishStatus	AS	ExamTimetablePublishStatus,

	T1.casework_nsip_project_info_internal_dim.Sector	AS	Sector,

	T1.casework_nsip_project_info_internal_dim.ProjectType	AS	ProjectType,
	T1.casework_nsip_project_info_internal_dim.Stage	AS	Stage,
	T1.casework_nsip_project_info_internal_dim.CaseReference	AS	CaseReference,
	'NULL'	AS	CaseID,
	T1.casework_nsip_project_info_internal_dim.ProjectLocation	AS	ProjectLocation,
	T1.casework_nsip_project_info_internal_dim.ProjectEmailAddress	AS	ProjectEmailAddress,
	T1.casework_nsip_project_info_internal_dim.Region	AS	Region,
	T1.casework_nsip_project_info_internal_dim.Easting	AS	Easting,
	T1.casework_nsip_project_info_internal_dim.Northing	AS	Northing,
	T1.casework_nsip_project_info_internal_dim.Transboundary	AS	Transboundary,
	T1.casework_nsip_project_info_internal_dim.WelshLanguage	AS	WelshLanguage,
	T1.casework_nsip_project_info_internal_dim.MapZoomLevel	AS	MapZoomLevel,
	T1.casework_nsip_project_info_internal_dim.ProjectDescription	AS	ProjectDescription,
	T1.casework_nsip_project_info_internal_dim.SoS	AS	SecretaryOfState,
	T1.casework_nsip_project_info_internal_dim.DateProjectAppearsOnWebsite	AS	DateProjectAppearsOnWebsite,

	T1.casework_nsip_project_info_internal_dim.DateOfDCOAcceptance	AS	DateOfDCOAcceptance,
	T1.casework_nsip_project_info_internal_dim.AnticipatedDateOfSubmission	AS	AnticipatedDateOfSubmission,
	'NULL'	AS	AnticipatedSubmissionDateNonSpecific,
	T1.casework_nsip_project_info_internal_dim.DateOfDCOSubmission	AS	DateOfDCOSubmission,
	T1.casework_nsip_project_info_internal_dim.DateOfRepresentationPeriodOpen	AS	DateOfRepresentationPeriodOpen,
	T1.casework_nsip_project_info_internal_dim.DateOfReleventRepresentationClose	AS	DateOfRelevantRepresentationClose,
	T1.casework_nsip_project_info_internal_dim.DateRRepAppearOnWebsite	AS	DateRRepAppearOnWebsite,
	T1.casework_nsip_project_info_internal_dim.ConfirmedStartOfExamination	AS	ConfirmedStartOfExamination,
	T1.casework_nsip_project_info_internal_dim.DateTimeExaminationEnds	AS	DateTimeExaminationEnds,
	T1.casework_nsip_project_info_internal_dim.Stage4ExtensionToExamCloseDate	AS	Stage4ExtensionToExamCloseDate,
	T1.casework_nsip_project_info_internal_dim.Stage5ExtentionToRecommendationDeadline	AS	Stage5ExtensionToRecommendationDeadline,
	T1.casework_nsip_project_info_internal_dim.DateOfRecommendations	AS	DateOfRecommendations,
	T1.casework_nsip_project_info_internal_dim.ConfirmedDateOfDecision	AS	ConfirmedDateOfDecision,
	T1.casework_nsip_project_info_internal_dim.Stage5ExtensionToDecisionDeadline	AS	Stage5ExtensionToDecisionDeadline,
	T1.casework_nsip_project_info_internal_dim.DateProjectWithdrawn	AS	DateProjectWithdrawn,
	T1.casework_nsip_project_info_internal_dim.Section46Notifcation	AS	Section46Notification,
	T1.casework_nsip_project_info_internal_dim.DatePINSForstNotifiedOfProject	AS	DatePINSFirstNotifiedOfProject,
	T1.casework_nsip_project_info_internal_dim.ScreeningOpinionSought	AS	ScreeningOpinionSought,
	T1.casework_nsip_project_info_internal_dim.ScreeningOpinionIssued	AS	ScreeningOpinionIssued,
	T1.casework_nsip_project_info_internal_dim.ScopingOpinionSought	AS	ScopingOpinionSought,
	T1.casework_nsip_project_info_internal_dim.ScopingOpinionIssued	AS	ScopingOpinionIssued,
	T1.casework_nsip_project_info_internal_dim.DeadlineForAcceptenceDecision	AS	DeadlineForAcceptanceDecision,
	T1.casework_nsip_project_info_internal_dim.DateSection58NoticeRecieved	AS	DateSection58NoticeReceived,
	T1.casework_nsip_project_info_internal_dim.PreliminaryMeetingStartDate	AS	PreliminaryMeetingStartDate,
	T1.casework_nsip_project_info_internal_dim.DeadlineForCloseOfExamination	AS	DeadlineForCloseOfExamination,
	T1.casework_nsip_project_info_internal_dim.DeadlineForSubmissionOfRecommendation	AS	DeadlineForSubmissionOfRecommendation,
	T1.casework_nsip_project_info_internal_dim.DeadlineForDecision	AS	DeadlineForDecision,
	T1.casework_nsip_project_info_internal_dim.JRPeriodEndDate	AS	JRPeriodEndDate,
	T1.casework_nsip_project_info_internal_dim.ExtentionToDateRelevantRepresentationsClose	AS	ExtensionToDateRelevantRepresentationsClose,

	--casework_contact_information_dim
	T3.casework_contact_information_dim.	AS	OperationsLeadID,
	'NULL'	AS	OperationsManagerID
	T3.casework_contact_information_dim. 	AS	CaseManagerID,
	casework_contact_information_dim 	AS	NSIPOfficerID
		AS	
	T3.casework_contact_information_dim. 	AS	NSIPAdministrationOfficerID
		AS	
	T3.casework_contact_information_dim.ContactID	AS	LeadInspectorID
		AS	
	T3.casework_contact_information_dim. 	AS	InspectorID

	t3.casework_contact_information_dim. 	AS	EnvironmentalServicesOfficerID

	'NULL'	AS	LegalOfficerID

	'NULL'	AS	dateOfNonAcceptance

	'NULL'	AS	rule6LetterPublishDate

	'NULL'	AS	notificationDateForPMAndEventsDirectlyFollowingPM,

	'NULL' AS	notificationDateForEventsDeveloper,

	'NULL'	AS	rule8LetterPublishDate,

	--main_sourcesystem_fact.Description	AS	SourceSystem
FROM odw_harmonised_db.casework_nsip_project_info_internal_dim T1
JOIN odw_harmonised_db.casework_contact_information_dim T3
ON  T1.ApplicantEmailAddress = T3.Email  AND CAST(T1.CaseCreatedDate AS date) = CAST(T3.CaseCreatedDate AS date)

%%sql
SELECT DISTINCT * FROM odw_harmonised_db.casework_nsip_project_info_internal_dim T1
LEFT JOIN odw_harmonised_db.casework_inspector_cases_dim T2 ON T1.CaseReference=T2.CaseReference
LEFT JOIN odw_harmonised_db.casework_contact_information_dim T3 ON T2.ContactID=T3.ContactID
